metadata.title: Blue Grey Daisy Pillow Covers 18x18 Set of 2 Teal Navy Blue Grey Colored Outdoor Throw Pillows Modern Floral Decorative Pillowcase Square Cushion Cover Linen Pillow Case for Home Sofa Couch Bed
features: High-quality Material: Linen, breathable, durable, thick, comfortable to touch. Warm tips: pillows insert is not included.
Standard Size: 18 X 18 inch (45cm X 45cm). Our outdoor blue gray pillow covers uses a high quality invisible zipper on one side, beautiful and sturdy, pulls smooth, easy to wear.

Simple Design: Our daisy throw pillow covers blue gray have the same design on both sides. And the modern abstract grey navy blue daisy pattern will create simple style to your room quickly. Suitable for decorating living room, bedroom, couch, patio, balcony, car, office.

Great Choice for Gifts: Our blue and gray throw pillows have clear patterns and no fading or wear issues. It is the perfect gift that you give to family, relatives and friends on holiday or anytime you want.
Washing Tips: Our grey and blue pillow covers can be hand-washed or machine-washed in cold separately, gently cycles only, please do not bleach or iron.
description: Our pillow covers blue gray are designed for you, help you quickly refresh and transform your home decor during the spring, and bring you the latest home fashion.

These navy blue and grey pillows are very suitable for decorating living room, bedroom, couch, patio, balcony, car, office, coffee room, bar etc, and perfectly math with all styles of furniture, such as, bed, sofa, chair.

Our blue and grey throw pillow covers made of high-quality linen, breathable, comfortable, durable, no peculiar smell, well made. It's a great choice when you're shopping for a cushion cover or sofa pillowcase, and it's also a idea gift.
Material: Made of linen, durable, soft and comfortable.
Washing: Machine washable or by hand, please do not to bleach.
Warm Tips:Due to the brightness of the light, there may be slight color differences between the picture and the actual product.
After-sales service: We promise to provide you with the best after-sales service. If there is any product quality problem, you can contact us at any time, we guarantee a full refund.
